name: Only One Mosquito (GMTK Jam 2019)
description:
Do you hear that buzz? Kill it, before it ruins everything. 

Please wear Headphones to fully experience this painful ASMR game. 

INSTRUCTIONS:

  1. Use the left and right arrow keys to slap your face. 
  2. Kill the mosquito so you can finally get some sleep. 

Features:

  •  Realistic mosquito behavior 
  • Ability to slap yourself in the face
  • Soothing sounds of the ocean, just like taking  a real vacation

=====

Only One Mosquito is made in less than 48 hours for the GameMaker's Toolkit Game Jam 2019. The game is visually minimal, relying on 3D positional sounds, to simulate sleeping with your eyes closed and hearing the world's most annoying mosquito buzzing around you.
